titleStmt.title: Herm'ælogium or, an essay at the rationality of the art of speaking. As a supplement to Lillie's grammer, philosophically, mythologically, & emblematically offered by B.J.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Bassett.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for T. Fasset, in St. Dunstans-Church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement leaf and errata leaf proceed text.
Thomason copy cut off at p. 94.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
